statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 10;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_count FROM products ORDER BY inventory_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND inventory_count < 50;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE inventory_count BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE inventory_count = 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 15 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%orange%' AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE inventory_count BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY orders.quantity DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count, CASE WHEN inventory_count > 50 THEN 'In Stock' ELSE 'Low Stock' END AS stock_status FROM products ORDER BY stock_status DESC, product_name;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity >= 20;
SELECT id, name FROM products ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 20;
SELECT s.name, p.name FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN products p ON s.id = p.id;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT products.name, suppliers.name, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id JOIN suppliers ON inventory.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT sales.id, sales.product_id, products.name, sales.quantity FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products WHERE inventory_count > 50;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM manufacturers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, inventory_count FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM manufacturers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 20 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments JOIN customers ON shipments.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
